articles.title: Study: AI programs might help ER overcrowding in hospitals
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence programs can help doctors and nurses predict hours earlier which ER patients will likely require hospital admission, a new study says.
articles.translated_title: Study: AI programs might help ER overcrowding in hospitals
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence programs can help doctors and nurses predict hours earlier which ER patients will likely require hospital admission, a new study says.

articles.title: AI search firm Perplexity makes $34.5 billion surprise bid for Google Chrome
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence search company Perplexity has made an unsolicited, $34.5 billion offer to purchase Google’s Chrome browser, a surprise move by a Google Search challenger that’s looking to upend how people find information online.
articles.translated_title: AI search firm Perplexity makes $34.5 billion surprise bid for Google Chrome
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence search company Perplexity has made an unsolicited, $34.5 billion offer to purchase Google’s Chrome browser, a surprise move by a Google Search challenger that’s looking to upend how people find information online.

articles.title: Musk blasts Apple for not featuring X, Grok; says lawsuit coming
articles.summary: Grok is owned by Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI.
articles.translated_title: Musk blasts Apple for not featuring X, Grok; says lawsuit coming
articles.translated_summary: Grok is owned by Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI.

articles.title: Musk threatens 'immediate' legal action against Apple over alleged antitrust violations
articles.summary: Elon Musk on Monday threatened Apple with legal action over alleged antitrust violations related to rankings of the Grok AI chatbot app, which is owned by his artificial intelligence startup xAI.
articles.translated_title: Musk threatens 'immediate' legal action against Apple over alleged antitrust violations
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk on Monday threatened Apple with legal action over alleged antitrust violations related to rankings of the Grok AI chatbot app, which is owned by his artificial intelligence startup xAI.

articles.title: YouTube to begin U.S. testing of new AI-powered age verification system
articles.summary: YouTube is ready to start testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. using artificial intelligence to distinguish between adults and minors based on their viewing habits.
articles.translated_title: YouTube to begin U.S. testing of new AI-powered age verification system

articles.title: Former Google Distinguished Engineer David Petrou Launches Continua, a New Vision for Social AI
articles.summary: Press Release Continua, the company pioneering Social AI, today announced it has raised $8 million in seed funding to uplevel the group chat, reimagining how artificial intelligence can be a true participant in dynamic conversations. The round was led by GV with participation…

articles.title: Elon Musk threatens to sue Apple over app store ranking of his AI app
articles.summary: Elon Musk said his artificial intelligence start up xAI will sue Apple for allegedly favoring AI competitors in its App Store in what he called a breach of antitrust regulations.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk threatens to sue Apple over app store ranking of his AI app
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk said his artificial intelligence start up xAI will sue Apple for allegedly favoring AI competitors in its App Store in what he called a breach of antitrust regulations.

articles.title: Can South Korea build a sovereign AI?
articles.summary: South Korea's Ministry of Science and ICT shortlisted five teams this month to take charge of the sovereign AI project, also known as "AI for everyone," aimed at developing domestically built artificial intelligence mode
articles.translated_title: Can South Korea build a sovereign AI?
articles.translated_summary: South Korea's Ministry of Science and ICT shortlisted five teams this month to take charge of the sovereign AI project, also known as "AI for everyone," aimed at developing domestically built artificial intelligence mode

articles.title: Anthropic offers AI chatbot Claude to US government for $1
articles.summary: Amazon.com-backed Anthropic said on Tuesday it will offer its Claude AI model to the U.S. government for $1, joining a growing list of artificial intelligence startups proposing lucrative deals to win federal contracts.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic offers AI chatbot Claude to US government for $1
articles.translated_summary: Amazon.com-backed Anthropic said on Tuesday it will offer its Claude AI model to the U.S. government for $1, joining a growing list of artificial intelligence startups proposing lucrative deals to win federal contracts.
